metadata.Title: CVE-2019-8936 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - medium
metadata.Description:
NTP through 4.2.8p12 has a NULL Pointer Dereference.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2019-8936` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

ntp - 1:4.2.8p10+dfsg-5ubuntu7.3
ntpdate - 1:4.2.8p10+dfsg-5ubuntu7.3
sntp - 1:4.2.8p10+dfsg-5ubuntu7.3
Available with Ubuntu Pro: https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: ntp package in esm-apps/bionic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1:4.2.8p10+dfsg-5ubuntu7.3').
